resource.chars: Picture (and initial) stuck on. The picture is reproduced in colours in Camb. Ant. Soc. Proc. vol. VII, pl. VIII (I). The main grounds are blue and green. In C. a mandorla with Christ seated on the rainbow, holding open book on His knee and blessing. Four masks of winds blowing at top and bottom. In 4 circles R. and L. formed by conventional branch-work are the Four creatures: L. top, Angel with book; below, lion with scroll. R. top, Eagle with scroll; below, ox with scroll, all nimbed and winged. At bottom in C. in (rather more than) half circle, Ezekiel half-length in pointed cap holding scroll in both hands and looking up
